level.heading: Display of license.
level.text: A license issued pursuant to this chapter shall be conspicuously displayed in the place of business of the licensee or, in the case of a mobile unit, upon the mobile unit.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-111
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-111, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 26-301.
